product_name: Timbuk2 Informant Camera Sling - Medium - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The medium-size Timbuk2 Informant Camera Sling looks just like a pared-down messenger bag, but hidden away inside are padded, customizable walls to hold your camera, lenses and a small laptop. Fully padded interior in anti-scratch tricot with movable internal walls protects camera bodies, lenses and your personal gear. Size medium fits one camera body with a medium lens and 3 additional lenses. Dedicated padded pocket fits the 11 in. MacBook Air or iPad. Additional internal mesh pockets for memory cards, batteries, filters, etc. Comes with a plushly padded, ambidextrous shoulder strap and Timbuk2 shorty cam for one-handed adjustability. Removable cross strap offers cross-body stabilization while riding. Adjustable straps on bottom can hold a tripod. Timbuk2 Informant Camera Sling includes a removable, waterproof rain cover. Closeout.
short_description: The medium-size Timbuk2 Informant Camera Sling looks just like a pared-down messenger bag, but hidden away inside are padded, customizable walls to hold your camera, lenses and a small laptop.
